name: Compliance Committee
description: Governance structure overseeing HIPAA compliance and risk management
components: Committee members, charter, meeting schedule, authority, decision documentation

name: Privacy and Security Policy Framework
description: Comprehensive policies and procedures governing all aspects of HIPAA compliance
components: Policy documentation, role definitions, approval process, distribution, annual review

name: Risk Assessment and Management
description: Systematic process to identify assess and mitigate HIPAA risks
components: Risk register, vulnerability assessment, threat analysis, mitigation plans, residual risk

name: Workforce Training and Education
description: Program ensuring all workforce members understand HIPAA requirements
components: Training curriculum, role-specific modules, initial training, annual refresher, documentation

name: Privacy Officer Oversight
description: Designated individual responsible for compliance program implementation
components: Privacy officer authority, responsibilities, resources, reporting structure

name: Security Officer Oversight
description: Designated individual responsible for security safeguards and incident response
components: Security officer authority, responsibilities, incident response authority

name: Business Associate Management
description: Program to ensure business associates comply with HIPAA requirements
components: Business associate agreements, audits, oversight, breach response procedures

name: Incident Response and Reporting
description: Procedures for responding to security incidents and breaches
components: Incident reporting procedures, investigation steps, mitigation actions, HHS notification

name: Documentation and Record-Keeping
description: Processes to maintain required HIPAA compliance records and documentation
components: Document retention schedules, access controls, storage, destruction procedures

name: Corrective Action Plan
description: Formal process to address compliance deficiencies and violations
components: Deficiency identification, root cause analysis, corrective action design, monitoring
